SEARCH
Package uk.msci.project.rsa

Class KeyGenerationContext

java.lang.Object
uk.msci.project.rsa.BenchmarkingContext
uk.msci.project.rsa.KeyGenerationContext
public class KeyGenerationContext extends BenchmarkingContext
This class is a specialised context for the benchmarking of key generation operations. It extends BenchmarkingContext to provide functionality specific to key generation, such as exporting generated public and private key batches on generalised results view.

    • exportPublicKeyBatch

      public void exportPublicKeyBatch() throws IOException
      Exports the batch of public keys generated during the benchmarking process. Delegates the operation to the GenModel.
      Overrides:

      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the export.

    • showExportPublicKeyBatchButton

      public boolean showExportPublicKeyBatchButton()

    • getResultsLabel

      public String getResultsLabel(boolean isComparisonMode)
      Provides a context-specific label for the results view based on the specific signature operation that was benchmarked. This label is used to display relevant information about the benchmarking context in the UI, offering users a clear understanding of the results being presented.
      Specified by:
      getResultsLabel in class BenchmarkingContext
      Parameters:
      isComparisonMode - A boolean flag indicating whether the benchmarking.
      Returns:
      A string label describing the key generation benchmarking results.
